definition: the act of passing something along from one person or group to another, pass along
details:
noun
- the act of passing something along from one person or group to another
= example: the act of passing something along from one person or group to another
- electrical device such that current flowing through it in one circuit can switch on and off a current in a second circuit
= synonyms: electrical relay
- a race between teams
= synonyms: relay race
- a fresh team to relieve weary draft animals
- a crew of workers who relieve another crew
verb
- pass along
= example: pass along
- control or operate by relay
